data.prayer: Father, we pray for every movement leader and disciple in the state of Mohale‘s Hoek, Lesotho that they would have deepening intimacy with you.
data.verse: On that day you will realize that I am in my Father, and you are in me, and I am in you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Mohale‘s Hoek, Lesotho

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Mohale's Hoek do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.section_summary: On average, 8 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Mohale‘s Hoek, Lesotho.
data.prayer: Lord, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 7 neighbors who are far from you in Mohale's Hoek. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.

data.prayer: Spirit, train the church of Mohale‘s Hoek, Lesotho to trust with all their hearts, and you will make their paths straight.
data.verse: Trust in Yahweh with all your heart, and don’t lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up prophets in Mohale's Hoek who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, help the 5,253 believers in Mohale's Hoek to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.prayer: Lord, the the state of Mohale's Hoek will disappear one day, but your Word will never disappear. Call all who claim Christianity to anchor their lives on your Word.
data.verse: Heaven and earth will disappear, but my words will never disappear.

data.section_summary:
the state of Mohale‘s Hoek, Lesotho has a population of 40,100.

We estimate Mohale's Hoek has 5,253 people who might know Jesus, 31,333 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 3,514 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 7 neighbors who need Jesus.
